column1: #Text=Qin says : " The Fire Lord 's chamber is that way , down the hall , to the left , and up the stairs , you ca n't miss it ! "
#Text=Sokka says : " Only thirty seconds until the total eclipse . "
#Text=I had a hunch that you survived .
#Text=I 've known about the invasion for months .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm ready to face you .
